import.description: Import string for Google Fonts. Use fonts.google.com to select nice web safe fonts for your story.

foreground.description: The common foreground color. Used for the base screen font.

background.description: The common foreground color. Used for the base screen font.

font.description: The base screen font. Use a common web-safe font, or use with the import command to import a Google Font.

header font.description: The header display font. Use a common web-safe font, or use with the import command to import a Google Font.

description.description: Description of your game. This is somewhat analogous to reading the back of a book.

series.description: The series this game belongs to. Usually paired with a series number to designate which entry this game is. For example, Andromeda Apocalypse is in the Andromeda series.

series number.description: The entry number for this game in the series. For example, Andromeda Apocalypse is the second game in the Andromeda series.

forgiveness.description: How forgiving the story is, on the Zarfian scale. First letter uppercase is required.
